title: Enhancing Web Development Practical Competencies: STEM Mathematics Instructional Design Based on Cognitive Load Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can construct three or more relational networks between mathematical concepts by applying CLO schema design principles.
The efficiency of instructional materials can be improved by over 20% using cognitive load measurement indicators.
Through project-based assessment, learners can develop two or more optimized learning pathways for real-world STEM problem-solving.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
